official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution requiring that federal judges be reconfirmed by the Senate every six years.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the tenure of specified Federal judges to six years unless the Senate consents to a continuance.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution requiring that federal judges be reconfirmed by the Senate every six years.
